website_summaries.verdict: A solid sandal for adventures in and out of the water.
pros: Comes in brown camo (Zappos and Amazon), grey-orange, pink, purple sparkle, blue-green, navy-yellow and crazy crabs blue-orange
cons: May run large, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and expected them to be big like this. It's hard finding sandals for size 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Three stars for now. Read the reviews and expected them to be big like this. It's hard finding sandals for size 4 toddler, most brands seem to start at size 5. I did, however, use the size charts both on Amazon and on Teva's website. My girl's feet are are 11.5cm exactly. That being said, she hasn't tripped up in them (in our uneven backyard) and they seem to be good quality. Hopefully they'll fit her brother next year so we can get more use out of them. I have the Velcro tightened all the way and they don't slip and slide around. We will be putting them to the true test next weekend doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these in the past so I ordered again. These run very big! (See photos) Love the brand and the quality but sending back for a smaller size. (They are not only too long but too big all around even with strapping down all the way)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard to fit feet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these sandals for all of my children over the years. We love them because they are very easy to get on and off, easy to clean and adjust well to fit just about every possible funny foot size. My kids tend to have very skinny ankles but chubby and wide feet, so it is always hard to find shoes that don't slip off. These are always a favorite for Mom and kids- no rubs and they stay on! I am back to order the next size up now!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Huge, not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously large. Measure foot and used the Teva chart from Teva site before ordering from Amazon. Shoe is huge and while it Velcro’s it is for easy on and off not for adjustment so a huge waste of time ordering and now returning. The size I order was a toddler 10 and it looks like an adult shoe. This is the fourth pair of Teva branded shoes for my son so what happened with the sizes????
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for sensitive kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves these sandals! She is picky and sensitive about how shoes and sandals feel. And she wants to wear these every day. The inside bottoms are flat, unlike some sandals that have raised designs or bumps that may irritate some kids. And they are very comfortable. The straps are soft and flexible. The bottom is sturdy. Great for running, climbing and any play. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Got them last year and liked them so much we got them again this summer ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them last year and liked them so much we got them again this summer in the next size! Super cute (strawberry design) and thick comfortable soles. I've seen others with flimsy bottoms and like that these have good foot support and are thick enough to keep feet a little off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Teva are the best they are ultra comfortable, durable and easy to clean. These are very cute as well. I have many reviews of Tevas as it’s all my family wears, we don’t waste time with other brands anymore. They are comfortable and last. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyefanjustin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Easy to clean when he gets them covered in mud. The Velcro makes them flexible if they end up being too small or too big. We've had them for a couple months now and my rough & tough 2 year old hasn't destroyed them yet so they're well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Design flawed
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen sandals which such large toe support . My daughter has tripped wearing them . Size isn't the problem it's a design issue . Waste of money unfortunately and can't wear them . Dangerous ..
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: Really grippy like a sneaker but breathable sandal so they don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair I have purchased for my son. Every year we get a pair in the next size. Really grippy like a sneaker but breathable sandal so they don't get stinky. They last ALL summer too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: I've bought multiple pair of these sandals for my son, and now my daughter. They are very sturdy and well built, also they are great for toddler's with chubby feet. Definitely order a size down, my daughter is almost into a 7 and they were huge - she even has a bit of room in the 6.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi S. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have the hardest time finding sandals that stay on and fit my child's wide feet. These have been great this summer. Also very easy to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They fit just right. Bought two pairs for my twins. Read the reviews about being too big so I ordered their size, now I wish I would've ordered a size up to give them a little room to grow. But I'm just going to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Run Big!
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they definitely run very large! I will keep them as her feet will keep growing, but it you want them for right now I might go down a size if your child is on the smaller end of the size you are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals - I went up by a size but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals - I went up by a size but shouldn't have done it. I assume it fits as expected as it's easily adjustable. We love these sandals - nice, light, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon T

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and colors, it just runs really big. Its wide and long. Compared to the other two pairs we received in the same size these were a size too big.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. VanderWal

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great Sandal for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of Teva Psyclone - newer styles appear to have a slimmer, more 'aquatic' footbed. These are terrific for running and playing all summer with their supportive footbed and easy-to-fit velcro straps at ankle and toes. 'Harder' rubber sole stands up well to multiple seasons' wear.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: She loves them and they don't even look like boy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sandals for my daughter even though they say boys. She loves them and they don't even look like boy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lace

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes so much...  But now the price too high...
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes so much... But now the price too high...
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kok Heong

customer_reviews.title: Fit and function point on
customer_reviews.text: The fit and function is great! Our 3 year old wears an 8. He can run, climb and anything else he normally does in sneakers without falls.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: The sandals seem great otherwise, and I'm sure we'll grow into them
customer_reviews.text: As others wrote, these fit much larger than their ordered size. The sandals seem great otherwise, and I'm sure we'll grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Himitsu

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking and swimming. There's one spot by the ankle bone that rubbed a bit but that was after a full day of swimming and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Booth

customer_reviews.title: TEVAS ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are long lasting for tough wearers! Beach, cement, grass...they hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes and well made. I purchased these for my one year old daughter to be worn as water shoes and they are perfect. Since they are Velcro they wil for her fur awhile. Overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amber R. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: Held up very well. My son wote all the time amd never broke down. Nice shoe and cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift to grand daughter ad she wore them a long time
customer_reviews.author: MBZ

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality shoes so far. My almost 4 year old wore them for a couple of months and still good
customer_reviews.author: Occasional shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... are a little big but the straps have a good hold on the foot
customer_reviews.text: They are a little big but the straps have a good hold on the foot. They are well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D_Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These are cute.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. I usually buy Nike or stride rite sandals these seemed quite abit wider but they seem well made and my toddler likes them
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: They made it almost through summer before a strap pulled out from the sole. Just a little disappointing considering the brand. Teva's have always been reliable in the past - for longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My kids spent the entire trip at disney wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals for my grandson. They are true to size and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are true to size and super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sandals. They are true to size and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCortes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality non slip and fits just right son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe. Easy to put on and take off. Good soles. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 6, but this runs large for my boy. The colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: ~Love2BMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for my toddler! They run large, order one size down.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Castro

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look very good, but the size too small for 4yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but ran large. Kiddo is a solid 7 in other brands, but 7 was huge on her. Returned for a 6 and have been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F

customer_reviews.title: satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: First order(I ordered Teva Psyclone 6), the size was wrong. so I returned soon. This time right size shoes were delivered. Shiny straps are cute. but shoes are big for my daughter. She will wear it next year. She likes it. I can't get this type/color of shoes in Japan, so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chiezo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these sandals. They literally fell apart in less than 2 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: michael staub

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for kids to run around on cruises and vacation. Seems a bit big but works for room to grow in to.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yacks

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe for toddlers! My son has worn them for a couple months & we’ve had no issues with blisters or wear/tear. Great for the water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandal but about three times too big! Will save
customer_reviews.author: Babs Knudson

customer_reviews.title: THICK SOLE PSYCLONE SANDAL.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the thick sole Teva. The Psyclome 6 is real thin sole sandal. My grandson very picky now because he been wearing soft Teva most of his life. This time I ordered these the 4s. They do run bigger than psyclone 6 sandal. I would say at least 1/2 size bigger. I ordered the digital camo. Parents like those I think crabs are cute. Lol once your child wears these sandals they be spoiled by soft shoes.
customer_reviews.author: angie2499

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't know how they fit. These were gift for step son in China. He likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
